title.rendered: Coverplast Blisters – Blister Bandaids on the go, Box of 100

content.rendered:
• Coverplast# Blisters uses hydrocolloid technology to help provide the ideal moist environment for blisters caused by friction to heal quickly.

Product Presentation

    • Shaped easy to peel-off patches
    • Available in assorted packs of heel and toe and heel only
    • Flatpack
    • Easy to store in handbags

How does Coverplast Blister work?

    • Helps alleviate or relieve pain and pressure
    • Cushions and protects
    • Promotes healing
    • Protects from water, dirt and germs
    • Conforms well to the treated area for long-lasting wear

excerpt.rendered:
✔Low & fair prices for high-quality goods
✔High customer satisfaction
✔Fast shipping, dispatched in two business days or less. Most metro orders are delivered within 1-4 working days.
✔100% secure shopping and safe checkout.
✔Australian trusted store, Australian based and owned. Your order is shipped from an Australian warehouse.
